Package src.controller

Class GuestManager

java.lang.Object
src.controller.GuestManager
public class GuestManager extends Object
GuestManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and GuestView and the model class - Guest.

It can initialize, create, update or search Guest details.

Since:
2022-04-05

  • Method Details

    • createGuest

      public static void createGuest(String firstName, String lastName, String creditCardNumber, String address, Gender gender, Identity identity, String nationality, String contactNo)
      Constructor for the guest in the GuestManager

      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the guest
      lastName - the last name of the guest
      creditCardNumber - the credit card number of the guest
      address - the address of the guest
      gender - the gender of the guest
      identity - the identity of the guest
      nationality - the nationality of the guest
      contactNo - the contact number of the guest

    • updateGuest

      public static boolean updateGuest(String guestId, int attributeCode, String newValue)
      The function to update the detail of the guest and save the file into database

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest id of the guest
      attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
      newValue - the new detail value for the guest
      Returns:
      true if updating of guest is successful. Otherwise, false if the guest id is not found.

    • updateGuest

      public static boolean updateGuest(String guestId, int attributeCode, String newValue1, String newValue2)
      Overloading method of updateGuest that update the first name and last name of the guest

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest id of the guest
      attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
      newValue1 - the new value for the first name
      newValue2 - the new value for the last name
      Returns:
      true if updating of guest is successful. Otherwise, false if the guest id is not found.

    • updateGuest

      public static boolean updateGuest(String guestId, int attributeCode, Gender gender)
      Overloading method of updateGuest that update the gender of the guest

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest id of the guest
      attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
      gender - the new gender of the guest
      Returns:
      true if updating of guest is successful. Otherwise, false if the guest id is not found.

    • updateGuest

      public static boolean updateGuest(String guestId, int attributeCode, Identity identity)
      Overloading method of updateGuest that update the identity of the guest

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest id of the guest
      attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
      identity - the new identity for the guest
      Returns:
      true if updating of guest is successful. Otherwise, false if the guest id is not found.

      public static ArrayList<Guest> searchGuestById(String guestId)
      Search method to search a Guest by guest id

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest id that want to search
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Guest object that correspond to the guest id

      public static boolean removeGuest(String guestId)
      Function to remove guest from the database

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest id of the guest that the user want to remove
      Returns:
      true if remove successfully. Otherwise, false if guest id is not found

    • printAllGuests

      public static void printAllGuests(boolean byId)
      Function to print all guest in the database that show the guest id and the Guest

      See Guest.toString() for the printing format of guest

      Parameters:
      byId - true if print by id. Otherwise, false if print by guest name.

    • validateGuestId

      public static boolean validateGuestId(String guestId)
      validate if the database has this guest according to guest id

      Parameters:
      guestId - the guest of the guest that you want to validate
      Returns:
      true if guest id exist. Otherwise, false if guest id does not exist

    • findGuestDetails

      public static boolean findGuestDetails(String keyword, boolean byId)
      Function to print guest details given a particular guest id

      Parameters:
      keyword - keyword to find guest, can be guest id or substring of guest name
      byId - true if find by guest id. Otherwise, false if find by guest name.
      Returns:
      true if guest id exist. Otherwise, false if guest id does not exist

    • initializeDummyGuests

      public static void initializeDummyGuests()
      Initializer for dummy guests in the hotel.

      public static void printGuestDetails(Guest guest)
      Print the complete details of the guest
      Parameters:
      guest - Guest object to print
